rows.label: qev012202_MSG0001
rows.name: We made it! Good to see the old girl is still here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'll get right to fixing her up, Chief!
Just give me one second here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, and try not to tear up when you see your
little protégé ride her Skell off into the sunset.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0004
rows.name:
Right, then. Time to make like a walnut
and get cracking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0008
rows.name: Aaand, done! Good as new.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0009
rows.name:
Pretty quick, huh? Back when I worked as tech staff,
they called me Lightning Mia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0010
rows.name: Nice! All systems are go...and visibility is perfect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0011
rows.name:
Thanks for all the help, Chief! My ride's back in action
and ready for the next adventure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_JNK0010
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: qev012202_SEL0011
rows.name: Watch Mia go.

rows.label: qev012202_JNK0020
rows.name: Stop

rows.label: qev012202_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mia about your reward for helping her.

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0012
rows.name: Aaaand...BLAST OFF![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0013
rows.name: Oh, come on. I've been shot down AGAIN?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0014
rows.name:
What'd I ever do to these people?!
Talk about your anger-management issues...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh, but this time I didn't just sit around
getting shot at, no sirree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0016
rows.name:
This time, I traced the trajectory of the bullets and found
that they came from a turret in the fort up ahead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0017
rows.name:
Guess I'm not getting through here till I've done
something about that fort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0018
rows.name:
Time to cook up a master strategy for taking it down!
Booyah, grandma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0019
rows.name:
Though that'll be tougher now that my Skell is busted.
...Aaaagain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0020
rows.name: But look on the bright side![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0021
rows.name:
The damage isn't bad, and there are still materials
left over from last time for me to fix it with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'll get started on repairs. Oh, and if you want
to kill time by, say, overthrowing that fort,
that would be awesome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0023
rows.name: We'll overcome this thing through teamwork, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0024
rows.name: You and me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0025
rows.name: Hmm? What's wrong? You get chased off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0026
rows.name: Phew... Don't scare me like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0027
rows.name: Repairs are going well. I just need a bit more time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012202_MSG0028
rows.name:
I'll keep giving it my best here, yeah?
You go do the same, Chief![ST:wait ]
